## üë®‚Äçüíª Side projects

Projects I worked on during my free time.

More recent projects appear first.


| Project                                                                        | Technologies                                        | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Personnal assistant                                                            | Python (TinyDB, Pillow, paramiko, feedparser), Java | **Ongoing project**. Personnal assistant built over the years to automatize many things on my computer. Organize and backup files on computer, NAS, USB drive. Track multimedia (book, movie, tv show, anime): follow release schedule, track & rate on online services. Help me to process personnal photos & videos: labeling, compression, edition, ...          |
| Apartment search                                                               | Javascript, Python, Flask, SQLite                   | Tools allowing me to sort through the apartment offers. Browser script & API to retrieve new offers from mails & websites, and remove duplicates. Browser script to highlight keywords in offers and determine if offer is worth it.                                                                                                                                |
| [Competitive programming](https://github.com/mattrero/competitive_programming) | Java, Python                                        | Solved many puzzles on CodinGame. Participated in multiple contests on CodinGame, BattleDev and internally at Soci√©t√© G√©n√©rale.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Mod for game Scrolls                                                           | C#                                                  | Mod to assist buy/sell of cards in TCG Scrolls (by Mojang). Automatically posts cards for sale, detects good offers, semi-automates exchanges.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Trading bot on online card game (TCG)                                          | Chrome extension, Javascript, Java                  | The bot detects good deals, buy them and sell them at higher price. It was resistant to market manipulation by whales players. Initial version was a browser extension that accessed prices directly from JavaScript objects. Later, the website generated images to display the prices. I built a second version in Java using custom made OCR to read the prices. |
| Automated Code Breaker                                                         | Java                                                | Tool to encode, decode and automatically break encrypted text. Allows to break many monoalphabetic and polyalphabetic algorithms. Uses cryptanalysis to detect best matching algorithm (mono/poly alphabetic) and find possible original message with plausibility score.                                                                                           |
| Ant simulator                                                                  | Java, Swing                                         | Simulation of an ant colony with the use of pheromones to signal food and predators                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Games on TI-89                                                                 | TI-BASIC 89                                         | During high school years, I made several 1v1 games on [TI-89 calculator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TI-89_series#TI-89): a chess game, a Worms-like game, a RPG battle game                                                                                                                                                                                      |
